title: Transportation 1
sentences: en tren porque es más rápido que el coche.
I travel by train because it's faster than the car.
llega tarde hoy por el tráfico.
The bus arrives late today because of the traffic.
Where can I buy a ticket to go to Madrid?
Me gusta ir al trabajo en
I like to go to work by bicycle when the weather is good.
What time does your plane leave tomorrow?
We wait for the subway at the central station.
I have to call a taxi to go to the airport.
cruza el mar hacia la isla.
The ship crosses the sea toward the island.
Do you prefer to travel by car or by public transport?
a esperar el autobús número diez.
I go to the stop to wait for bus number ten.
My uncle has a very noisy motorcycle.
There are many passengers in the waiting room.
muchas horas para llegar al pueblo.
I have to drive many hours to get to the village.
de esta ciudad es muy moderno y limpio.
The subway in this city is very modern and clean.
I put my suitcases in the trunk of the car.
Do you want to travel through Europe this summer?
We have to get on the train right now.
At which stop do we have to get off?
The port is full of small boats.
Don't forget your passport before leaving home.
This trip is going to be very fun.
está en rojo, tienes que parar.
The traffic light is red, you have to stop.
Are you carrying a lot of gasoline in the tank?
